title: Manage My Pain
description:
Chronic pain affects 1 in 5 individuals. It can be hard to explain to friends, family, and doctors. It can feel like it's taking control of your life and your mental health. Learn to conquer your chronic pain. Manage My Pain helps you and others better understand what you are going through. It has helped thousands of people with conditions like fibromyalgia, headaches, arthritis, or back pain better understand their symptoms and provide evidence of their pain for their doctors, insurance companies, or government agencies. Manage My Pain was created in partnership with industry-leading pain researchers - your doctor will actually read the reports from our app! Our daily reflections help people focus on their meaningful activities as opposed to the limitations created by their pain.

Manage My Pain will help you:
‚Ä¢ Record how you're feeling: Easily describe your pain in less than 30 seconds
‚Ä¢ Understand your unique pain criteria: Fully customizable options with each pain record let you identify factors such as how your pain feels, what the factors made the pain worse, which medications help you with your pain, and many more
‚Ä¢ Reflect on your day: Take your mind off pain and record activities that are meaningful to you
‚Ä¢ Highlight patterns and trends: Charts and graphs describe your results and get more powerful over time
‚Ä¢ Track how well your meds are working: Add any medication to your profile and mark if it helps manage your pain
‚Ä¢ Describe your pain to your doctor: Summarize your pain through unique reports that your doctor will actually read

Developed for patients suffering from and care-givers or medical professionals treating: 
‚Ä¢ arthritis & rheumatism
‚Ä¢ cancer 
‚Ä¢ chronic pain
‚Ä¢ headaches & migraines 
‚Ä¢ fibromyalgia 

Use this pain management app to replace your hand-written: 
‚Ä¢ pain diary 
‚Ä¢ pain journal 
‚Ä¢ pain log 
‚Ä¢ pain tracker 

The Pro version adds the ability to view or report on more than the last 30 days. Reports are free to generate, however, those that contain advanced sections may require an additional credit to be purchased. An optional monthly subscription can be purchased so that an unlimited number of reports with advanced sections may be generated without the need for credits.

recentChanges:
Version 3.6.2056:
* Stability, cosmetic, and translation fixes throughout
comments: **UPDATE** after receiving response from customer support (which was expedient and right on the money for what I needed). I absolutely LOVE this app!!! (upgrade from 4 stars to 5!!) Once I was clear on how to use app, I really appreciate having somewhere to log my daily concerns. I do wish there were more specific body parts, but I LOVE that u can put notes in and be more specific there.

Really great free app with incredibly reasonably priced premium levels (although I've not needed to upgrade from free yet so can't comment on their pros & cons). You can add your own pain descriptors and chart things like mental fog and fatigue. It doesn't take too long to fill out and you can easily change the entry date. The only thing I "don't like" is that it defaults to filling out the daily reflection rather than pain when opening the app. Definitely recommend for chronic pain sufferers!

Really useful for tracking pain, and I like all the options they give you for stuff. Plus you can make your own! I just started tracking my pain and this app has helped give a visual of how much I neglect to address my physical health. Glad I stumbled upon this :)

I started using this app because I know I will need a lengthy history to be diagnosed with fibromyalgia. I like how easy this app is to use and record my daily symptoms and over all how Im feeling. This app is super helpful.
Love this. Most apps that track your activities etc are very limited without subscribing but this one has a lot of free features and is a great way of keeping track of patterns

title: PainScale - Free Chronic Pain Tracker Diary
description:
The Popular pain tracking app for iOS and Android !.  Awarded one of the Best Fibromyalgia apps of 2019 ‚Äì by Healthline. Join over 100,000 chronic pain patients who manage and scale their pain and symptoms with Painscale; the highly-ranked pain tracker health app on the web! 

The PainScale app offers a FREE suite of pain management tools to help chronic pain patients to scale their pain.
Manage a Pain Tracker Diary!

Created with input from doctors and chronic pain patients, the Pain Diary acts as a pain tracker and organizes all the information the patient needs in one accessible location. With over 800 organized articles, health tips, exercises, information on pain meditation programs and treatment options, pain management becomes easier.   	

PainScale provides personalized pain management education for users. Trusted content. is available to help people understand their symptoms and better manage their condition. By providing insights to a community of other patients who share their treatment information, PainScale helps patients discover information about treatment options that may work for their condition.
PainScale is an easy and simple to use, pain and health tracker app.
 
Features

 ‚Ä¢ Pain Diary ‚Äì log and track your pain to track triggers, pain intensity, symptoms, treatments, medications, activity, mood, and sleep digital scale.
 ‚Ä¢ Pain Reports ‚Äì get and send summary and detailed reports for better patient-physician communication, you can take all the information you need from the Pain Diary.
 ‚Ä¢ Insights - personal tips to help you discover information about treatment options to better manage your condition
‚Ä¢ Trusted Content ‚Äì get FREE access to a searchable library of articles, videos, and meditations to help find pain relief,
 ‚Ä¢ Daily Health Tips ‚Äì get daily meditation, stretches, and exercise routines, everything you need to help you cope with your chronic pain
 ‚Ä¢ Integration with Google Fit ‚Äì simplified and seamless connectivity with Google Fit for tracking health and fitness activity
 ‚Ä¢ Reminders ‚Äì get reminders to help stay engaged with restoring your health
 ‚Ä¢ Care Team Communication - tap-to-call and tap-to message functionality options that connects you directly with your Physician and Support Network
 ‚Ä¢ Customize your experience for pain management with a personal profile
Get the info you need in the following topics:

 ‚Ä¢ Chronic pain
 ‚Ä¢ Pain relief
 ‚Ä¢ Lower back pain
 ‚Ä¢ Back pain
 ‚Ä¢ Neck pain
 ‚Ä¢ A migraine
 ‚Ä¢ Fibromyalgia
 ‚Ä¢ Failed back surgery
 ‚Ä¢ CRPS
 ‚Ä¢ Arthritis
 ‚Ä¢ Pain management
 ‚Ä¢ Coping
 ‚Ä¢ Neuropathy
 ‚Ä¢ Nerve pain

Get Help: contact us at help@painscale.com
Visit Us: Access your account on the web.

Log in at https://www.painscale.com
Like Us: Join the PainScale community by liking us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/MyPainScale/
 

What are the things that make your pain increase, what spikes or triggers it, and what helps you the most?
PainScale helps you get actionable insights to better your pain relief and health in general. 

Pain scale and pain diary have been used by physicians for almost five decades ‚Äì it is one of the most valuable tools in pain management. Painscale.com takes advantage of the modern digital technologies to provide an easy to use pain tracking solution using the same proven pain management methods. PainScale.com web site and the app is designed for educational purposes only. If you have any concerns about your own health or the health of someone else, you should always consult with a physician or other healthcare professional

Download Now PainScale - Free Chronic Pain Tracker Diary!!!

recentChanges: Added new personal insights for Triggers and Symptoms and bug fixes
comments: Outstanding App to help you track pain types, areas and symptoms. Able to show different pain types in different areas of the body. I love that you can add notes as well in journal entries! The reports are fantastic and easy to email with you deciding the custom time span. The insights that can show correlation between activity, weather, and other triggers really helps. Love that I can attach to Samsung Health and thus my sleep, EKGs and pulse rate, BP, etc to see correlations! Great App!!!

I've been using this app for months now and I still love it. It's easy to use, it syncs with my Samsung Health, and the helpful articles and tips are normally quick reads and informative, and it has easy adjustments in the settings. I highly recommend this app.

So far it's a good useful app. One suggestion. Love to have ability to add multiple entries during the day without altering my earlier input.This will help me better track triggers and effectiveness of the different things I do to help alleviate my pain. Also, there needs to be room for more than one entry for doc location,insurance& pain on opposite side of the body.If I have pain in back of legs and knees, the figure turns around but deleted the previous tagged body pain location.

I've only been using this app for a short time but so far it is the best that I have tried. I have chronic pain with various etiologies and the app has a detailed pain map that allows me to more precisely record my pain. The automatic time stamp is a great feature as is the ability to link it to my Fitbit for superior insights that corralate sleep and activity to pain levels. Im holding off on that 5th star because I am still learning the app and all of its functionality.

The PainScale app has been great! I am able to track my whole day. Pain, food and anything else I need. I have added my glucose readings in the notes. I am also able to put on there my activities making me able to see any issues and also my progress. Thank you!

title: ibis Paint X
description:
ibis Paint X is a popular and versatile drawing app downloaded more than 100 million times in total as a series, over 2500 materials, over 800 fonts, which provides 379 brushes, 71 filters, 46 screentones, 27 blending modes, recording drawing processes, stroke stabilization feature, various ruler features such as Radial Line rulers or Symmetry rulers, and clipping mask features.

*Youtube channel
Many tutorial videos on ibis Paint X are uploaded to our YouTube channel.
Subscribe it!
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCo2EevPr79_Ux66GACESAkQ

*Concept/Features
- A Highly functional and professional features surpassing that of desktop drawing apps.
- Smooth and comfortable drawing experience realized by OpenGL technology.
- Recording your drawing process as a video.
- SNS feature where you can learn drawing techniques from other users' drawing process videos.

*Features
ibis Paint X has high functionality as a drawing app along with features of sharing drawing processes with other users.

[Brush Features]
- Smooth drawing at up to 60 fps.
- 379 kinds of brushes including dip pens, felt tip pens, digital pens, air brushes, fan brushes, flat brushes, pencils, oil brushes, charcoal brushes, crayons and stamps.
- Various brush parameters such as starting/ending thickness, starting/ending opacity, and initial/final brush angle. 
- Quick sliders that allow you to quickly adjust brush thickness and opacity.
- Real time brush previews.

[Layer Features]
- You can add layers as many as you need with no limit.
- Layer parameters that can be set to each layers individually such as layer opacity, alpha blending, adding, subtracting, and multiplying.

*In-app purchases
We provide you with two ways of purchasing ibis Paint X: ‚ÄúRemove Ads Add-on‚Äù (one off payment) and ‚ÄúPrime Membership‚Äù (monthly payment). When you become a prime member, advertisements will remove. So, if you become a prime member, it will be cheaper not to purchase the ‚ÄúRemove Ads Add-on‚Äù.
If you have already purchased the ‚ÄúRemove Ads Add-on‚Äù, even if you cancel the ‚ÄúPrime Membership‚Äù, advertisements will remain removed.
The more people become prime members, the faster we can develop our application. We would like to create more functions, so please consider becoming a prime member.

[Prime Membership]
A prime member can use the prime features. You can try it free for the one-month at the time of the first purchase.A prime member can use the following features and services
 - Prime Materials
 - Prime Fonts 
 - Tone Curve filter
 - Gradation Map filter
 - Clouds filter
 - Reordering artworks in My Gallery
 - No advertisements in screens except the Online Gallery
 *After you become a prime member with the 30 days free trial, if you do not cancel your ‚ÄúPrime Membership‚Äù at least 24 hours before the last day of the free trial, your ‚ÄúPrime Membership‚Äù will be automatically renewed and you will be charged for the automatic renewal. 
 *We will add premium features in future, please look out for them.

[Remove Ads Add-on]
Advertisements are displayed on ibis Paint X . If you buy this Add-On (one off payment), advertisements will remove.
Even if you become a prime member, advertisements will remove. So, if you become a prime member, it will be cheaper not to purchase the ‚ÄúRemove Ads Add-on‚Äù.

*On Data Collection
- Only when you are using or going to use SonarPen, the app collects audio signal from microphone. The collected data is only used for communication with SonarPen, and is never saved nor sent to anywhere.

*Questions and support
Questions and bug reports in reviews will not be responded to, so please contact ibis Paint X support.
https://ssl.ibis.ne.jp/en/support/Entry?svid=25

comments: Overall, I like this app. I just have a couple suggestions to make. -Add a trash feature, so that you still have some time to get a deleted picture back in case you accidentally delete something or change your mind. -Add a slider to the video playback. With really long videos, it's annoying to have to watch the entire thing through to get to certain parts, even with the fast-forward.

This app is great! There's not that many ads, there's the right amount of tools to make wonderful drawings! It can be a little confusing at first but you'll soon get used to it! The only problem I have is, you have to have a membership to rearrange art order in your gallery?? I know they need to make some money somehow but... That just seems ridiculous and unnecessary, but other then that it's great!

I need help, like when I was coloring the drawing that I just finished, suddenly it disappears, i was very scared of what just happened, i think I can redo it but I clicked on the redo button for like 1000 times it still doesn't give me back my drawing. I'm very anxious after what just happened. So can someone please help me out with this, please...üò∞üò∞üò∞üò∞

This is byfar one of the best and very intuitive drawing app, I can work faster using Ibis compared to when I'm working with another drawing app. Stabilizer works great, doesn't stabilize too much, although I'd rather have the heavy stabilizer as optional because sometimes I need it too. Or at least there's more curved or flex ruler.

I love this app and I would recommend but you have to be aware of lower battery and deleting this app. But there are so many cool things you can do. I use this all the time. It's easy, fun and free only, you have to watch an add before using all brushes. This is good quality and needs no WiFi.

title: Pain Relief Hypnosis - Chronic Pain Management
description:
‚óé A single audio session of 30 minutes a day that is effective* in just 1‚Äì3 weeks
‚óé Hypnosis audio carefully read by the soothing voice of a certified hypnotherapist
‚óé Peaceful background music and nature sounds to help you relax
‚óé Hypnotic Booster with binaural beats to induce your brainwave frequency into an optimal state for receiving hypnotic suggestions
‚óé Separate volume controls for Voice, Background, and Hypnotic Booster
‚óé Awaken at End feature can be disabled at bedtime for a relaxing, restful sleep

THE BEST PAIN-RELIEF HYPNOSIS APP AVAILABLE

comments: So far so good.. We sleep to it good, 2 days if improvement! Tonight in going to try the boost. Headphones time for the binaural beats... Simple app, highly useful
Best app for pain management that I have tried I noticed a difference when I didn't use it for a week

Works but free version sucks. All options are blocked. You can not do anything but play and stop. You have buy each app for access to get access just to rewind. Seems greedy when they claim to want to help. Not even free trial to see if blocked options are worth purchase.

I have severe difficulty in falling asleep some nights, so bad that occasionally I'm up for 36 hours because I could not fall asleep at all. Also I've never been able to be hypnotized but last night I tried this app for the first time and within minutes of completing the First session I was asleep. Some nights it's pain that keeps me awake, and some nights it's my brain that won't wind down and allow me to rest and last night both were preventing me from getting to sleep until I tried this app.

I've only spent $ to change the settings, so I'm only using the free track. I haven't noticed relief in my a.m. (fibromyalgia/arthritis) stiffness/achiness, but I sleep better. I also have ADHD, so focused relaxation and then hypnosis drop usually has me asleep quickly. I love how she phrases things ("that all is just right") and the slightly amused tone when she talks about toes. I've only gotten to the end 2x, and I've used the imagery during a nerve pain flare to calm it. Love this app!

title: Pathways Pain Relief
description:
The Pathways pain relief program has helped hundreds of patients reduce, and sometimes even get rid of persistent, aka chronic pain.

When pain lasts for longer than 3 months, our body's pain system can start becoming overactive and overprotective. Sounding the alarm (pain!) all too often. But there are steps we can take to retrain your brain, and turn down the volume on pain.

We've helped patients with all different types of diagnosis reduce pain. The most common diagnosis include:

Back pain 
Migraines/headaches
Repetitive Strain Injury (RSI)
Neck Pain
Fibromyalgia
Joint Pain
Digestive Issues
Shoulder Pain


Here are some of the key techniques you'll find in the Pathways program: 

Pain science education
Diaphragmatic breathing
Visualizations & Graded Imagery
Physical Exercise
Meditations
Mindfulness Exercises
Stress Reducing Exercises

Your personal pain therapist will take you on your own journey to understanding why you feel pain, and work to break the pain cycle. 

You can track how your pain develops over time, and focus on the pain relief techniques that work for you.
descriptionHTML:
The Pathways pain relief program has helped hundreds of patients reduce, and sometimes even get rid of persistent, aka chronic pain.

When pain lasts for longer than 3 months, our body's pain system can start becoming overactive and overprotective. Sounding the alarm (pain!) all too often. But there are steps we can take to retrain your brain, and turn down the volume on pain.

We've helped patients with all different types of diagnosis reduce pain. The most common diagnosis include:

Back pain
Migraines/headaches
Repetitive Strain Injury (RSI)
Neck Pain
Fibromyalgia
Joint Pain
Digestive Issues
Shoulder Pain


Here are some of the key techniques you'll find in the Pathways program:

Pain science education
Diaphragmatic breathing
Visualizations & Graded Imagery
Physical Exercise
Meditations
Mindfulness Exercises
Stress Reducing Exercises

Your personal pain therapist will take you on your own journey to understanding why you feel pain, and work to break the pain cycle.

You can track how your pain develops over time, and focus on the pain relief techniques that work for you.
summary: The Pain Relief App. Created by pain patients & scientists üë®üèº‚Äç‚öïÔ∏èüë©üèª‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è
developer: Natural, proven & safe chronic pain relief
recentChanges: Challenges notification implementation, bug fixes and improvements.
comments: This is full of amazing ideas to help with persistent pain, broken into bite size pieces that you can try. Some seem more appropriate than others but this will obviously vary from person to person. A mix of physical and mental emotional suggestions, and they don't take a lot of time. Little and often is what's needed so even on a busy day you can do something to help.

Excellent for chronic pain sufferers. It has helped me to rewire my brain to deal with a severe back injury which I'm now at the tail end of. However this app is more than dealing with pain. It's about neuroplasticity which is now helping me eliminate vertigo and tinnitus. Definitely worth the subscription as they are constantly updating content.
I love this app. I learned so much about pain and I feel understood in my issues. Thank you soo much

I have sciatica symptoms related to a bulging disc that have continued for a year. I have already found benefit in reduced pain symptoms after a few days. I am really shocked, in a good way. I am normally reluctant to pay for an app but compared to the thousands spent on gp, physio, chiro, pain medication, this is really not much. It has given me back some hope that my quality of life will improve which is priceless. I'll update the review after a few weeks, maybe even pain free!

WOW the whole app changed since I been thinking of doing it. Is there no more old sessions? What happened to the old sessions? I know I tested the old 10 free sessions & loved them, but was not ready to use the app & now everything change. As well as why can't your app be moved to the sd card? It takes too much space on the internal space when you are low on space. The app keeps crashing because my phone is low on space as there is no way to move it to the SD card.

title: Delivery From the Pain: Survival
description:
Delivery From The Pain is a survival-strategy game with a fantastic RPG storyline, it may take over 30 hours to unlock one ending if you are familiar with survival games.

„ÄêFeatures„Äë
‚ñ∫ Unique doomsday experience with hidden game features.
‚ñ∫ Multiple endings full of mysteries and surprises. Which one is the truth?
‚ñ∫ A huge map with dangerous, attractive 3D urban buildings. 
‚ñ∫ Lifelike NPCs with particular timelines and evocative story development.
‚ñ∫ Thought-provoking, consequential dialogue options.
‚ñ∫ An array of weapons and a unique sneak system that will provide hours of experimentation in combat and enjoyment of the game. 
‚ñ∫ Study system and workshop that offer myriad strategic choices. Try and acquire the safest shelter right away!
‚ñ∫ Over ten kinds of zombies with specific skills and four ultimate boss monsters are waiting for you
‚ñ∫ Google Drive sync support, you won't lose your progress.
‚ñ∫ Support for Metal rendering to further enhance the performance!

„ÄêAbout Challenge Mode„Äë
The core of the gameplay is to live longer in the game as the ultimate goal. The challenge mode uses large map scene, which can be used except for BOSS scenes and other scenes of NPCs.

In Professional difficulty, saving file will be deleted when the player failed. The challenge will be restarted. In Normal difficulty, saving file can be saved, and the save rule is the same as the game normal mode rule.

„ÄêAbout New DLC„Äë
1.New Story: the story between Big Brother and Moira and explain lots of confuses you may have while playing main game.
2.New Pet: a dog named hamburger will join your fight with zombies, and he can be more energetic in toxic areas.
3. New game system: creative feeding system, training system and cooking system will offer you a brand-new survival adventure experience in the zombie‚Äôs world.
4.New Map: a new map of lumberyard will be added to offer you base survival food sources, you can hunt animals and get other materials like potatoes, medical herbs and wheat there.
5.New Character: a man who worked for Big Brother in Big Brother previous gang will appear in new DLC, you will know how can he survive in doomsday and you can trade with him too.
6.New Mode: you can get unlimited survival supply pack under assist mode when you want to have a quick understanding about the new story, if you are an experienced survival game player, you can try the survival mode with significant difficulty to challenge yourself.
7.New Cooking System: you can send gifts to Moira to get new surprise from her.
 
„ÄêStory„Äë
In 201x, an anti-cancer research institute announced the discovery of the key to eternal life. In response to this breakthrough, Faith Energy Company concocted a vaccine-driven startup, the ‚ÄúHuman X Plan.‚Äù However, the vaccine failed and all infected humans were turned into zombies. The area where you live has been severely affected. To uncover the conspiracy behind the Human X Plan, you have to explore and survive!

You will meet many survivors. Do you want to see them all survive to the end? At what cost? What secret was hidden in the abandoned tapes, newspapers, magazines and files that you find along your way? Can you figure out the password to unlock the hope of door? 

„ÄêWe want to tell you„Äë
This game is our first 3D indie game, we started to develop this game since 2015, and we are lucky to expand team from 5 to 7 members. We've put a lot of effort into "Delivery from the Pain"  but we think we can add much, much more!

New content updates will continue as we try to deliver a polished product that you can be a part of the development, growing with us & guiding "Delivery from the Pain" to potentially become a series.

We want all of your feedback, every idea, & each opinion to make "Delivery from the Pain" as sharp & complete as possible.

„ÄêFollow us„Äë
FacebookÔºö @DeliveryFromThePain
TwitterÔºö @DeliveryPain
Discord: https://discord.gg/Y88CZ66

comments: Awesome, i gave you some money because i really like the game and it's well made. Some advices i wanna give you: Dont let the player heal his diseases by watching videos, it makes everything too easy and less challenging, This makes the meds also useless. Slightly improve the resistence of weapons. Add the trade value of each item. For the players: All the ads that show up can be skipped after 5 secs, and they're not so repetitive as some comments say.

Tried to play on Pixel 4 XL and the game just keeps crashing while trying to open it up. Finished chapter 1 and after I closed the game I tried to open it up again and it keeps crashing. Sometimes right before login screen sometimes right after clicking "Continue" and it's just so random. I even reinstalled and played the first chapter all over again but still the same issue after closing the game once. I hope the bugs will get fixed at some point so that the game is actually playable.

The best! This is by far the best zombie game I've played. It's not out to break your wallet and cheat you out your items. We get to fight and kill like all the other games, we get to build our shelter, and collect items to survive. We get free packages with lots of good items, we sleep, food spoils like it's real. Only thing I would suggest is to make it larger other than that I wouldn't change a thing. Keep the cost and packages the same cause that is what puts you over the top.

BEST Modern survival game I have ever played. You can play it at a stretch for 4-7 hours if you can, it's designed that way. Challenging but no unplayable roadblocks, Doesn't get boring and LOTS OF CONTENT. after Westland Survival, this one is my most played. Happy to watch ads to get much needed supplies. Love the realism and detail , greater than most other survival games

good game. but theres some issue i need to be in balance. save proggress must be in all times. you only save the game when you return in the base. thats really sucks me out. and the potato. when its fresh. it only stacks 1. but if its rotten. its stackble. what is that? and the weapons. easy to break. even a crowbar with high consume reasource. easy to break out. the car even its not on use. continues to break. and all max stacks is only 20. please fix the game a bit. please

title: Pain Diary - Pain Management Log
description:
This log can help you track the everyday things that have an impact on your pain. When you understand what makes your pain worse, you can begin to work on ways to reduce or deal with your pain ‚Äútriggers.‚Äù

The more you know about how your body reacts, the more you can be in control. And being in better control can help you be less afraid and better able to manage your pain. 

This app makes it easy to track your pain & symptoms and report to your doctors. Use our pain diary to keep track of your pain over time and share it with your doctor at your next appointment. Track a variety of pain elements, including location, pain duration, triggers and more.

A pain diary is used to monitor levels of pain over a long period of time and collect data on possible triggers for that pain. One solution pain doctors recommend is keeping a pain diary, a consistent record of your pain experience.

Your doctor will be looking for triggers, stresses, and patterns. The more detailed you can be about the factors that seem to influence your pain, the better. An accurate record of your pain will help your doctor give you the best treatment.

Why a Pain Journal Works for Chronic Pain
This information is useful both for you and your doctor. It can be used to help identify patterns of pain, such as time of day or level of stress, or pain triggers from certain activities. A pain journal can also show what doesn‚Äôt increase your pain, which can help you make better decisions about how you spend your day. 

What exactly do you log in a pain journal? Everybody uses their journal differently, but in this app you can do the following:
- Give your pain a scale rating. We use the pain scale with the 0-10 rating system, with 0 representing no pain and 10 representing the worst imaginable pain. Your pain will usually fall somewhere in between.
- Use pain descriptor words. Using pain descriptor words in your journal can help you track changes and patterns in your pain quality. It can also help doctors pinpoint your type of pain.
- Track the time of day pain occurs. 
- Note what you are doing when your pain begins. 
- Look at elements that might contribute to your pain.
- Write down what you ate and drank that day.
- Describe your mood

won't let u edit, the date says 1 thing, when u save the date changes

title: Back pain relief exercises at home
descriptionHTML:
With this application you will be able to engage in the treatment and prevention of diseases of the back and neck at home. Exercises will help get rid of back pain and strengthen muscles to support the spine.

The application contains a set of complete workouts:
- lower back workouts;
- thoracic spine workouts;
- neck workouts;
- post op and fracture recovery workouts;
- stretching workouts;
- morning exercise;

The application contains more than 100 exercises for the development and strengthening of the muscles of the back, abdomen, shoulder girdle, legs, buttocks and neck. Performing these complexes will ensure your back health and posture correction.

Each exercise has a video instruction and a detailed description of the technique.

Timer and sound instructions allows to perform workout without looking into device.

Create and customise your own workout from existing exercises.

Follow your progress with detailed statistics.

Setup reminder for next trainings.

A warning! If there are intervertebral hernia or protrusions, be sure to consult your doctor before performing the exercises.
summary: Back and neck pain relief exercises. Post Op and fracture recovery. Stretching
recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: A nice app with lots of options to customise workouts and reps. Really glad for the voice that announces what move is coming next as I always forget and the beeps for each rep. Has helped tremendously in setting up a simple stretching routine to help with my recovery from a back injury.

I've been using this app for my back for years. I didn't realise I hadn't rated it!! Great app. It's really helped me with my back pain as I have a bad posture. In particular I always use the "Stretching the spine" exercises.

At my age and 40 really only concentrated on upper body weight training in past. Thankyou so much for this app! Good option for a simple workout or with an added workout! Life saving stuff, encouraging and easy to follow and stay focused.

I suffer from lower back pain ever since I got sciatica from a back injury. These small workouts actually work better than my rehabilitation workout. A minor delay between the rep countdown and the animation, but better to work at your own pace anyway and do how many you're comfortable doing.

It is a great app to work on all parts of your body. The only disadvantage is that when you want to make your personal plane is gets difficult to order the exercises. I mean moving them up and down one by one is time consuming.

title: Pain Rating Scales
description:
Quantification of the pain intensity is essential for someone experiencing pain (eg. to report level of pain to others, for monitoring treatment effectivenes, etc.) or when caring for persons with the acute or chronic pain. Most pain assessments are done in the form of self-reporting or observational (for non-verbal persons unable to provide self-report) pain rating scales. 
This application provides some of the most used, validated and widely accepted pain assessment and rating scales. Featured are self-reporting and observational scales for pain assessment in infant, children, adults, demented persons, ICU patients and persons experiencing chronic or low-back pain:
- Pieces Of Hurt Tool (Poker Chip Tool)
- horizontal and vertical Numerical Rating Scale (NRS-11)
- Numerical 11 Point Box Scale (BS-11)
- horizontal and vertical Visual Analogue Scale (VAS)
- Color Analogue Scale (CAS)
- Faces Rating Scale (FRS)
- Neonatal Infant Pain Scale (NIPS)
- Face, Legs, Activity, Cry, Consolability scale (FLACC)
- Pain Assessment in Advanced Dementia scale (PAINAD)
- Chronic Pain Grade Scale (CPGS)
- Critical-Care Pain Observation Tool (CPOT)
- Roland-Morris Disability Questionnaire (RMDQ) 
Each scale is equipped with short description, instructions for use, scoring methodology, interpretation of results and references.

comments: I like this app for using a couple times a week, just to check in with a couple pain scales, then I take screen shots and add then to journey (online diary app). It really helps me keep track of what's going on, beyond just using the more granular app I use everyday. This one is great for keeping to show my pain management doctor because it's not so much information.

this app is brilliant. can you please please diverse into animals? can you add the load pain score? then i can get my clients to use it, along with half the vet world at least! it would be amazing! also, animal lameness scoring. Also maybe one where we can add and analyse our own questions...and....email the results to practitioner? all would be amazing! please please please!
Suggestion - Include an analogue scale version which instead of 0-100 can be scaled from 0-20 or 0-30 or any other user chosen value.

title: Curable: Back Pain, Migraine & Chronic Pain Relief
description:
Take control over chronic pain with the Curable app. Our step-by-step program will help you learn what is happening in your body and apply practical tools to reverse the cycle of pain. Let our smart coach, Clara, guide you through the latest developments in pain science with fun, easy-to-understand audio lessons. Identify, target, and eliminate the factors that are keeping your pain ‚Äústuck‚Äù through a series of guided, evidence-based exercises. Curable is a new type of chronic pain app, helping you to retrain your brain and nervous system for long-term results.

What you can do in the app:

-Learn about the neuroscience of pain through engaging audio lessons

-Reduce hypervigilence and fear of pain through practical, easy-to-apply techniques

-Optimize your nervous system to handle flare-ups more effectively with the ‚ÄúPanic Button"

-Calm your mind and body with guided meditations and visualizations specifically designed to target pain factors

-Reprocess strong emotions and life events that may have contributed to the development of pain

-Listen to interviews with physicians, pain scientists, and other experts

-Create a practical plan for re-incorporating joy and movement into your life

-Gain a new perspective on your symptoms and their significance through cognitive reframing

-Customize your experience by providing ongoing feedback to your smart coach, Clara

-Find inspiration, motivation, and support within our private community

The Curable program is evidence-based, and is recommended by physicians, physical therapists, and pain psychologists all over the world. It can be an important part of a treatment plan for migraine, fibromyalgia, neck & shoulder pain, back pain, sciatica, nerve pain, foot pain, hip pain, knee pain, RSI, hand and wrist pain, and more. 70% of Curable users experience some degree of relief in physical symptoms after just 30 days in the program.

Learn through engaging audio lessons that explain the neuroscience of pain as it applies to different aspects of life:
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉPerfectionism
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉPeople Pleasing
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉAnxiety
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉDepression
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉSelf Esteem
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉExpectations
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉAdversity
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉCaregiving
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉParenting
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉMajor Life Events
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉPTSD
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉChildhood Stress
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉThe Stress of Pain
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉTriggers

Retrain your brain to lessen the experience of pain through exercises of meditation, reflection, writing, CBT, and visualizations. For stories of recovery from real users, please read our reviews. To learn more about our approach, check out our podcast on iTunes: ‚ÄúLike Mind, Like Body."

IN THE PRESS:

"Very rarely, an app comes along that changes your life. I want to tell you about such an app, and how it changed mine.‚Äù
-Jon Evans, TechCrunch, ‚ÄòCuring the Incurable'

‚ÄúA multidisciplinary pain program at the Mayo Clinic in Minnesota for treatment very similar to what Curable does (but in-person) costs $40,000.‚Äù -BizWest, 'App may change way patients, physicians approach chronic pain'

On "The Mighty":
'13 Favorite Apps for People With Chronic Conditions'
and '16 Products People With Chronic Pain Swear by That Fit in Your Purse'

Also featured in:
Women‚Äôs Health
Shape
Venture Beat
Elite Daily
Brit+Co

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS
Curable offers the following auto-renewing subscriptions:
1 month: $14.99
1 year: $119.99

This price is for US customers. Pricing in other countries will be converted to your local currency depending on your country of residence.

Your subscription will automatically renew unless your subscription is canceled at least 24 hrs before the end of the current period. To manage your subscription go to your Google Play store and to Subscriptions. 

Curable also offers a Lifetime subscription which is paid for by a one-time upfront payment of $299.99 for unlimited access to the Curable app.

Privacy Policy:
https://www.curablehealth.com/privacy
Terms of Service:
https://www.curablehealth.com/terms

‚ÄúA multidisciplinary pain program at the Mayo Clinic in Minnesota for treatment very similar to what Curable does (but in-person) costs $40,000.‚Äù -BizWest, 'App may change way patients, physicians approach chronic pain'

On "The Mighty":

With the release of Curable Version 4, we‚Äôve made serious investments in your journey to recovery. comments: Content is great... When I can access it. If I pause a recording it is very hard to get out to open again. I have to try repeatedly and don't know if it will work. I've given up and read the transcripts for some things but that doesn't work well for a meditation. Please fix these bugs!

I think this is a brilliant app and my pain is so much more manageable after only a month. My reason for only giving 4 stars is that an awful lot of the work is going back to childhood. I have done years of therapy and I just don't need this so a lot of exercises etc are useless to me. Some brain training exercises and the somatic taking is really helpful... Building new neural pathways.

As a musician, RSI has had a significant effect on me for years and finally now I'm able to play again. The app works on the premise that after the source of pain has healed, the sensation can remain because the brain gets stuck in a pain loop, exacerbated by anxiety and anticipation of the pain. The app is based on valid (and relatively recent) research and I'm delighted to say it has worked for me. Thank you Curable.

Great concept but app needs some fixing I love curable and what they do. The content is great but sometimes my meditations stop playing somewhere half way and it ruins the whole meditation experience. Another thing is sometimes the shortcut for the meditation will stay on my drop-down in which nothing will make it disappear unless I restart my phone. Just a bug I'm assuming hopefully the developers fix this

This app may help you. You will need to be able to tune your body to certain unknown frequencies and believe that the MRI study they refer to was not a flawed study from the start. If you are easily brainwashed this is the app for you. Worth a try if you are in constant pain. Good luck.

title: Kaia Pain Management
description:
Kaia is your at-home back pain management app developed by medical professionals.

‚ñ∂ THE ADVANTAGES OF KAIA BACK TRAINING:

‚Ä¢ Created by medical experts: Kaia was developed in cooperation with pain experts and doctors from the Klinikum rechts der Isar in Munich and is based on the National Guidelines for the Treatment of LBP (Lower Back Pain).
‚Ä¢ Individually personalized: Whether you are a beginner or consider yourself an athlete - Kaia exercises adapt to your fitness and pain levels via intelligent algorithms.
‚Ä¢ Easy to use from your home to the gym: Daily training sessions that you can perform in just 15-30 minutes without any extra equipment.

‚ñ∂ HOW KAIA WORKS:

‚Ä¢ Kaia customizes itself to suit your needs: Assesses pain location and intensity as well as current fitness level to create personalized training plan.
‚Ä¢ Personalization: Through your feedback after the training units, the exercises adapt continuously.
‚Ä¢ Demo videos: High-quality videos ensure the exercises are performed correctly.
‚Ä¢ Motivational: Kaia keeps you motivated to accomplish your personal training goals!
‚Ä¢ Progress: Track your training progress and see how back pain and sleep perception improve over time.

‚ñ∂ WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT FROM KAIA: 

‚Ä¢ Physiotherapeutic strengthening exercises for the entire stabilizing musculature of the spine
‚Ä¢ Psychological relaxation exercises which have been shown to improve perception of back pain
‚Ä¢ Extensive background knowledge about back pain
‚Ä¢ Tips & tricks for dealing with back pain
‚Ä¢ Back training & pain prevention

‚ñ∂ WHAT KAIA PRO USERS SAY:

Susanne, Kaia user:
"Kaia is not very time-consuming, trustworthy and appealing and above all: It helps!"

Franziska, Kaia user:
"Kaia offers qualified exercises combined with high-quality information about our back and relaxation exercises. I have never had such an interdisciplinary combination and its effectiveness speaks for itself."

PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP & DATA PROTECTION

If you opt-in for the subscription, you pay the fixed price for your country which is displayed in the app. Regarding the prices in other countries please contact support@kaiahealth.com. The subscription renews automatically, if it is not canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. Your account will be debited within 24 hours of expiration of the current subscription for the next term. The current runtime of in-app subscriptions cannot be terminated. You can disable the automatic renewal feature at any time via the account settings.

Many experts are involved in the development: experienced physiotherapists, psychologists and doctors. By purchasing a subscription, you support the continuous development of Kaia. Thus we are constantly improving the app for you at no extra cost for you.

‚ñ∂ Terms & Privacy

Privacy Policy: https://www.kaiahealth.com/us/legal/privacy-policy/
General Terms and Conditions: https://www.kaiahealth.com/us/legal/terms-conditions/

-------------------------------------------
Visit us at: www.kaiahealth.com/us
Follow us and stay up to date:
facebook.com/kaiahealth
twitter.com/kaiahealth
Send us and email, we love to chat: service@kaiahealth.com

title: Painalog - Fix pain easy!
description:
Painalog helps you discover the source of your muscle and joint pain and provides you with easy-to-follow self-massage and stretching videos customised to your pain. 

Painalog uses the same pain treatment framework (Trigger Points) used by massage therapists and physiotherapists to treat complex sport and occupational injuries. Since the 1960s bodyworkers, chiropractors and even acupuncturists have been using this framework to treat issues like lower back pain, shoulder pain, knee pain, sciatica, tennis elbow or any kind of muscle or joint pain you can dream off!. 

Extensive studies conducted in the 1960 discovered that each muscle in the human body has a unique pain signature. By identifying the pain signature you can find the exact set of muscles that are the cause of the pain. 

Studies have shown that not only do dysfunctional muscles cause pain but they can also cause other symptoms like migraines, dizziness, heartburn, ringing in the ear, nausea, indigestion, bloating. It can affect your sleep, cause weight gain and affect your relationships. 

With Painalog that vast array of human pain maps and solutions is available for you in this handy little app. So now you can fix your pain without a pill, doctors visits, surgeries, lab test and booking costly appointments.

How Painalog will help you:

* Locate your pain using our advanced, one of its kind 3D pain mapping.
* Answer  a few simple questions and we will Sherlock Holmes your problem to a maximum of six possible muscles.
* Follow the video provided to locate, self-massage and stretch each of those muscles to keep the pain away.
* The Analysis report and videos can be saved for future use, even shared with friends,family or physicians.

Painalog combines simple self-massage techniques with stretching so you can beat pain and  live a fuller life.

Painalog is a great app for chiropractors, massage therapists, physiotherapists, medical professionals and anyone who wants to learn about treating chronic pain through simple massage techniques.

Painalog is free to use once every week (subject to change). One can upgrade for doing unlimited scans using the low cost monthly, six-month or annual pricing.

comments: Fantastic one for self care and for helping others in muscular skeletal issues.

Was a great app until you decided to charge for services. Now it will not load or play videos. My subscription is being canceled and the app will be deleted. Updated review. The problems are resolved and app is working perfectly. Thank you so much for fixing it.

Is there a way to change my profile to a woman? It some how got switched to a male and I cant switch it back. This app is amazing! It allows you to select the area of tenderness than gives the the muscles that could be associated, how to self reset the muscles, you can save your scans. Bravo, this is the best tool to help getting to the root cause of my pain. NO magical pill will ever resolve trigger points.

It is an Excellent appropriate App were the trigger point of the Skeletomuscular system accurately working and without any medicine can Heal the pain, and the Design of this work locate, stretch and release, kudos to the their Ideolgy.

Never even opened, because it would not open! I suspect it's because I denied access to my photos and files Etc. No need for them to have access to that so I will uninstall. A Pity, it seemed like it was a good app.

title: Ouchie: your pain management companion
description:
Use Ouchie to help take control of your chronic pain through data, social support, and rewards. Ouchie was created for pain patients by pain patients with input from best-in-class doctors and pain specialists. 

Ouchie will always be free users, and our mission is simple: We want to help you find a way to feel better, faster.

If you live with lower back pain, neck pain, knee pain, migraines, fibromyalgia, CRPS, Crohn's Disease, endometriosis, arthritis, lupus, nerve pain related to sciatica, or more, Ouchie‚Äôs mission is to help you find a way to best self-manage.



The app is easy to use and offers:

- Tracking 
Track your pain. Create your personalized journey by updating your Ouchie profile with your specific pain type or condition. You can record changes to your pain level, medication usage, treatments, mood, sleep patterns, accomplishments, challenges, goals, and more.
Set the privacy levels and share as much or as little as you want. You can now have this information ready to go at appointments with your healthcare team.

- Community Support
Share your story. Connect with others who are also affected by the pain or condition you‚Äôre living with. Offer support and get supported. The Ouchie community has thousands of patients and you‚Äôre sure to find someone who can relate to what you‚Äôre going through. Finding and interacting with others can lessen your suffering.

- Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT)
Celebrate your accomplishments. Ouchie regularly recognizes daily efforts! You can set targeted goals and work toward achieving them. The more you keep track of your progress and support others along the way, the more rewards you can earn.

- Educational Content
Learn more about pain management. Ouchie provides you with valuable resources that can help you discover new ways to treat your pain. We partner with leaders in the pain management space and provide access to trusted, of-the-moment resources and articles, directing you to meditations, support groups, exercises and stretches, meal plans, current research and news, and more.



You‚Äôve struggled with your pain alone for long enough. Better understand your symptoms, manage your condition, and perhaps even have some fun while doing so! 

Join the Ouchie community today.

Say hi: hello@ouchie.com
Get help: support@ouchie.com
Check us out on the web: www.ouchie.com

title: Chronic Pain Support
description:
MyChronicPainTeam is a social network and support group for those living with chronic pain. Get the emotional support you need from others like you, get practical tips to manage your life with chronic pain, and insights about treatment or therapies. MyChronicPainTeam is the only social network where you can truly connect, make real friendships, and share daily ups and downs in a judgment-free place.

-Keep up and follow members photos & updates
-Quick photo buttons so you don't miss a beat 
-Post updates about the daily ups & downs 
-Get/Give instant hugs, likes & comments of support 
-Search the Q+A section/ask and answer questions 
-Add others to your team 
-Find others near you and like you
-Add your diagnosis and view others

MyChronicPainTeam is for those living with chronic pain.

Coming soon in our next release:
Resource Center

and
In-App Notifications!

title: Pain Diary (Privacy Friendly)
description:
Privacy Friendly Pain Diary can help you track pain. It allows you to make daily diary entries recording your condition and the intensity, location, nature and time of the pain you feel, as well as the medication you take and additional notes. Records of your pain can help health professionals gain an insight into the pain you are experiencing.

The main view of the app is a calendar. A new diary entry can be added and existing diary entries can be viewed by selecting a day in this calendar. Diary entries can be exported to PDF. You have to specify a period of time for which the entries are to be exported. You also have the option to share that PDF.

Privacy Friendly Pain Diary has a daily reminder function. If enabled, it displays a notification reminding you to make a diary entry if you have not made one yet. You can set the time at which you want to be reminded in the settings.

How does Privacy Friendly Pain Diary differ from other similar apps?
1) Minimal permissions
Privacy Friendly Pain Diary requires write access to your device‚Äôs storage if you wish to
export your diary entries to PDF. All other features do not require any permissions.

2) Protection of privacy
User data is not recorded, nor sent to any third party. The data you enter is only locally
stored on your device.

3) No advertisements or tracking mechanisms
Privacy Friendly Pain Diary distinguishes itself from many other applications in the way that it does not include any advertisements or tracking mechanisms. Advertisements can shorten battery life or consume mobile data, while tracking mechanisms can compromise privacy.

Privacy Friendly Pain Diary belongs to the group of Privacy Friendly Apps developed by the SECUSO research group at Technische Universit√§t Darmstadt. Privacy Friendly Apps are Android applications which are optimized regarding privacy. Further information can be found here: https://secuso.org/pfa.

notes of pain levels as well as adding more character space in the notes

work enough to be useful
Without multiple entries for a day... Useless

title: Lower Back Pain and Sciatica Relief Exercises
description:
Lower back pain can be caused by many different things, but if you're looking for general lower back pain relief, these 7 exercises are all what you need.

Back pain arises as a result of physical injury, incorrect posture, and misalignments that are neglected, pulling muscles out of place. If you are one of the 65 million Americans reporting lower back pain and discomfort on a regular basis, it‚Äôs no wonder that we seek relief from this additional stress and strain.

Exercises to Treat Low Back Pain and Sciatica
Lower back pain treatment is solved in a number of ways, but not all of these options are accessible to everyone. For those experiencing mild to moderate pain on occasion, all that might be necessary is a simple pain management medication. Other options might be surgical relief or a chiropractic protocol for moderate to severe pain. If cost is an option and you find yourself in need of pain relief in between medical and chiropractic appointments, however, it might be beneficial to try some simple exercises at home to get the blood flowing and those vertebrae moving.

These lower back strengthening exercises are a great way to strengthen your low back and your core in general. They also help strengthen your glutes, hamstrings, and other pelvic muscles.

Doing these exercises regularly has proven to ease lower back pain and provide some relief from the stress that chronic pain can bring to your daily life. Practice these on a consistent basis, and you‚Äôll be feeling better with each repetition.

Do each of these exercises for 1 minute, emphasis on technique not speed! Take time to hold the positions and really work those muscles. Have a rest in between the sets.

title: Paint Free - Drawing Fun
description:
Paint Free is one of the best fun painting and drawing app or sketching app on Play Store. You can use their fingers or a stylus to draw beautiful drawings and unleash your creativity and entertain yourself at the same time. It's simple and fun to use, you can enjoy and learn drawing on this app. Paint is absolutely lite weight and completely free app which can be used for educating and introducing someone to drawing right from your phones or tablets. You can use this to practice the alphabet and numbers and paintings.

This app has a simple and easy to use design. It is not confusing and easily recognisable  icons are used in the app which makes it easy for everyone to use. This is a single screen and one click app, you land on the app and can start using it as soon as you click on app icon, no annoying welcome screens or button clicks required to actually start working on the app.

WE WILL NEVER SHOW YOU FULL SCREEN ADS, WE KNOW THEY ARE ANNOYING AND BREAK THE FLOW OF USER ESPECIALLY KIDS.

Key Features of Application

- Paint Free is one of the best painting or drawing apps for you to unleash their creativity.
- You can draw beautiful pictures and paintings with over 20 colors.
- This App offers you a white background to start fresh drawing on.
- Using Paint Free you can Save and Share the picture through social media.
- Paint Free offers multiple brush and eraser sizes for a great experience.
- Paint Free is a lightweight paint app which hardly takes any space on your device.
- Paint Free works on both phones and Tablets.
- Best suited for phones having a screen size greater than or equal to 4 inches.

https://in.pinterest.com/besteapplications/app-kids-paint-drwaing-fun/

https://plus.google.com/u/0/collection/sr5PZE

Please share this app if you like it. Happy painting everyone.

title: 6 Minute Back Pain Relief
description:
6 Minute Back Pain Relief is a research-backed workout program built for people who suffer from back pain or who want to stretch and exercise their back to prevent problems in the future. The exercises and yoga poses featured in this app come highly recommended by the leading physiotherapists and are very easy to do, but will make your back feel wonderful. 

These exercises do not require any equipment, and therefore, can be done anywhere, whenever you want to give your back a nice stretch.

Our goal is to help people who suffer from mild back pain, stiff neck and shoulders or other discomfort created due to sitting for long periods of time. If you don‚Äôt have the time to spend hours at the gym, but need a bunch of great exercises that will make your back feel great, check out 6 Minute Back Pain Relief! 

App features include: 

- Stunning design with easy to follow exercises and timers
- Clear instructions + links to videos for each exercise to guide you 
- All content is INCLUDED (no additional charges, and no need for internet connectivity) 
- Reminder notifications that can be adjusted to fit your busy lifestyle 
- Track your activity with our activity calendar and monthly graph

* Please consult with your physician or other medical professional before performing any exercises featured in this app, especially if you suffer from serious back pain, hernia or protrusion of the spine.

recentChanges: Minor Fixes
comments: Having back pain on a daily basis, I have tried these excercises out of desperation . They do work great to alleviate back pain . Even better than pain relievers and i cant tell you how happy I am about this app. Theres only a few excercises, so you can learn them quickly. Now that I do them regularly, it helps stop my back pain BEFORE it starts. I strongly recommend this app to anyone suffering from mild to severe, occasional or chronic back pain. Try it...I guarantee you'll be glad you did.

Great concept! I would suggest verbal instructions, as it is nearly impossible to view the excercises being displayed while doing them. Also, a time gap between the exercises and rest periods of about 10seconds would be more convenient, as this gives one opportunity to switch positions, without having to pause. I would also suggest displaying the exercises (and their demos) before the session starts, as to allow the user opportunity to familiarise themselves with the excercises and do them well!

Good app ,& easy could be better. I like the 6mins just enough to get the chair kinks out. Cannot set to repeat every couple of hours. This needs cues like chimes or dings to tell how long to hold each pose in order to follow avatar without having to constantly keep eyes on the phone, annoying! Transition from resting to next exercise is too fast, is frustrating, and must rush to catch up. That's the reason for stars. Would pay for a pro version if this app was a bit more intuitive.
Very good. Also why did you cut short your per session exercises to 3?. I love the old way of doing all the exercises at once. Please see if you can include all of them.
So cool, there're lots of exercises useful, also has access youtube link to do correct the exercises from trainers. Thanks for all for this app creators üëçüëçüëç

title: Orientate
description:
Orientate‚Äù, is a Laterality Recognition Program that forms part of a Graded Motor Imagery, a rehabilitation program based on clinical trials to treat pain and movement problems.

Laterality recognition or Left / Right Discrimination are known to occur in stroke patients and patients with CRPS/RSD and phantom limb pain. The ability to identify Left or Right is important for normal recovery. Orientate‚Äù laterality software provide images of hands and feet in different positions and postures, on nine levels, totalling over one thousand five hundred images.

Research shows the ability to identify Left and Right is slower and less accurate in people suffering from pain, and there is a direct link to the ability to correctly recognize Left and Right to the level of pain. Orientate‚Äù has been developed to measure this ability, and help retrain the brain. 

Stroke patients may lose the ability to recognize a complete left or right hemisphere. As part of a comprehensive rehabilitation program Orientate‚Äù will help to retrain the brain to see and recognize this missing hemisphere and aid the remapping of the brain. 

Like all therapies laterality recognition dose not always show immediate results. The rate and amount of recovery much depends on the extent of the damage, and the intensity and duration of the therapy you receive. Recovery also is likely to be influenced by personality, life experiences and coping styles. Motivation to recover is a key factor in obtaining an optimal level of rehabilitation.

Learn more about graded motor imagery rehabilitation at http://www.mirrorboxtherapy.com 

Try for yourself the first three levels completely free.

title: Osteoarthritis Joint Pain Treatment Home Remedies
description:
In this app we have tried compiling information on causes symptoms treatment prevention home remedies foods to eat and avoid for osteoarthritis. Osteoarthritis, the most common form of arthritis caused by cartilage degeneration, is affecting many people worldwide especially the older age.

The most common symptom of osteoarthritis is pain in the affected joint or joints but other osteoarthritis symptoms and signs include
* swollen joints
* joint stiffness
* joint creaking
* loss of range of motion
Osteoarthritis commonly affects hands, feet, spine, and the large weight-bearing joints, such as the hips and knees but any joint in the body can be affected.
Although it is not a diseases but just a natural ageing of the joints and can be hereditary too. Certain conditions like obesity, diabetes, gout, hormone disorders are also associated with secondary osteoarthritis. There is no blood test performed for the diagnosis of osteoarthritis.

This app provides you complete information on the osteoarthritis !!

title: Yoga Poses for Lower Back Pain Relief
description:
Lower back pain can be debilitating and affect daily activities, sleep, and exercise.

For many of us, lower back pain becomes a major part of the story of our lives. For some, it begins early, for others it starts as we age. We can all sense when our back is about to give out. immobility and helplessness.

There are many causes of back pain including strain while lifting, exercise, or chronic overuse of the muscles. Fortunately, there are many ways to release the tension in your lower back including yoga poses. 

Yoga poses can be done anywhere and don‚Äôt require equipment, so they provide an easy fix for tension. The moves work by both releasing knots and stretching out muscle fibers via relaxing and restorative postures.

Some immediate relief can be found through doctors, chiropractors and massage therapists. Sometimes surgery and drugs seem like the only long-term solution. 

For a growing number of people though, life style changes, often through physical therapy and yoga, are the long-term answer. I argue from personal experience that developing a regular yoga practice will offer the same benefits of physical therapy with many added bonuses overall for the lower back pain sufferer. And its not just me saying so, either. In a report about a case study (Medscape Medical News 09/29/16), a regular yoga practice was shown to be as effective in relieving pain for the lower back pain sufferer as physical therapy. 

Now, this is hardly definitive proof that all lower back pain sufferers will benefit from yoga or that all yoga is good for back pain. However, a growing number of us are finding solutions in our yoga practice. The additional benefits of practicing yoga regularly are vast, and pretty exciting. The biggest for me was development of mindfulness. It is amazing how a simple shift in focus to the breath immediately brings you into the present moment. Not a bad bonus at all. Just like any physical activity, remember to consult with your physician or physical therapist before beginning the physical aspect of the yoga practice.

App features include:
- Stunning design with easy to follow yoga poses and timers
- Clear instructions, mindfulness practice, benefits and contraindications for each yoga poses to guide you 
- All content is INCLUDED (no additional charges, and no need for internet connectivity) 
- Reminder notifications that can be adjusted to fit your busy lifestyle 
- Included Back pain guide to understanding your condition and knowing your treatment options.
- Included 11 easy Yoga Poses to relieve lower back pain and tension in 10 minutes or less:
1. Child's Pose | Balasana
2. Extended Puppy Pose | Uttana Shishosana
3. Cobra Pose | Bhujangasana
4. Cat Pose | Marjaryasana - Cow Pose | Bitilasana
5. Pigeon Pose | Eka Pada Rajakapotasana
6. Half Lord Of The Fishes Pose | Ardha Matsyendrasana
7. Wind Release Pose | Pawanmuktasana
8. Knees To Chest Pose | Apanasana
9. Happy Baby Pose | Ananda Balasana
10. Legs Up The Wall Pose | Viparita Karani
11. Supine Spinal Twist Pose | Supta Matsyendrasana

Any information included in this app should NOT be considered a replacement for medical advice from a medical professional. If you are suffering from any form of a health condition, always seek advice from a doctor before trying any home remedy yourself.

We will not be held responsible or liable in any way for any damage, injuries, illness, or death that may result from the use of its content or anything associated with it.

title: PERIOD PAIN - HOW TO STOP PERIOD PAIN FAST
description:
Menstruation, or period, is normal vaginal bleeding that happens as part of a woman's monthly cycle. Many women have painful periods, also called dysmenorrhea. The pain is most often menstrual cramps, which are a throbbing, cramping pain in your lower abdomen. You may also have other symptoms, such as lower back pain, nausea, diarrhea, and headaches. Period pain is not the same as premenstrual syndrome (PMS). PMS causes many different symptoms, including weight gain, bloating, irritability, and fatigue. PMS often starts one to two weeks before your period starts.

Topics that being covered:
# What Are Painful Periods?
# What Causes Painful Periods?
# The Symptoms of Menstrual Cramps/Period Pain
# What Can I Do About Period Pain?
# 10 Ways to Relieve Period Cramps
# Period Pain: 6 Home Remedies
# 6 Foods That Will Make Your Period Better

# 10 Reasons You Should Take Your Bad Menstrual Cramps Seriously
# When Should I Get Medical Help For My Period Pain?

title: Back Pain - causes, symptoms, treatments
description:
Back pain is a common reason for absence from work and doctor visits. Although back pain may be painful and uncomfortable, it is not usually serious. Even though back pain can affect people of any age, it is significantly more common among adults aged between 35 and 55 years. Experts say that back pain is associated with the way our bones, muscles and ligaments in our backs work and connect together.

Pain in the lower back may be linked to the bony lumbar spine, discs between the vertebrae, ligaments around the spine and discs, spinal cord and nerves, lower back muscles, abdomen and pelvic internal organs, and the skin around the lumbar area.

Pain in the upper back may be due to disorders of the aorta, tumors in the chest, and spine inflammation.

Back pain is a common problem that affects most people at some point or time in their life. Your back is a complex structure made up of bones, muscles, nerves and joints. This can often make it difficult to pinpoint the exact cause of the pain.Most cases of back pain aren't caused by serious damage or disease but by minor sprains, strains or injuries, or a pinched or irritated nerve.

These types of back pain can be triggered by everyday activities at home or at work, or they can develop gradually, over time.

We encourage you to read and follow the guidelines in this back pain app and it will help you in the long run.

title: Pain Log
description:
Are you fed up with your headaches? Would you like to know the reason of your pain in the ribs? Don't you know why do you have pain somewhere in your body? Download right now Pain log and write down whenever you have a pain, you can easily have a diary with all the information in order to look for a solution. Export, send or share easily the results through v√≠a google Drive, Dropbox, Telegram, Whatsapp, Gmail, Hangouts etc... What are you waiting for downloading the best app about pain's register in internet? Moreover, pain log is free,without publicity and open source.

Collecting information about your headaches on a notebook can help you to get the deseases. Stress, depression or not sleeping properly can cause a headache. Moreover, having these pains registered could help your doctor to identify the kind of headache that you have, because it can be migraines or tension headaches. In this way, your doctor will help you to find a correct solution to your problem and probably to eliminate it.

Now you can do easily a register by using Pain log. You just have to follow these stages:

‚Ä¢ Create a calendar. For example: headache.

‚Ä¢ Write the dates down, a short description and the intensity of your headaches for a period of time.

‚Ä¢ By clicking you could transfer your information to an excel chart.

‚Ä¢ Talk to your doctor.

Simple and really easy.

Pain log is an open-source application totally free, which is located un github with licence GNU GPL V3.0

Now you can do easily a register by using Pain log. You just have to follow these stages:

‚Ä¢ Create a calendar. For example: headache.

‚Ä¢ Write the dates down, a short description and the intensity of your headaches for a period of time.

‚Ä¢ By clicking you could transfer your information to an excel chart.

‚Ä¢ Talk to your doctor.

Simple and really easy.

Pain log is an open-source application totally free, which is located un github with licence GNU GPL V3.0
If you are interested in the project, you can visit this link:


https://github.com/rulogarcillan/PainLog

title: Pain Assessment
description:
This application is used by pain management practitioners to assess patient's disability levels using a standard set of pain assessment questionnaires. 

Questionnaires incorporated in the application are:

- Oswestry Low Back Pain Disability Index
- Headache Disability Index
- Neck Disability Index
- Shoulder Pain and Disability Index
- Knee Score Questionnaire
- Quadruple Visual Analogue Scale
- Pain Disability Questionnaire
- Functional Rating Index


Workflow consist of the following steps:

- The practitioner selects questionnaires to be filled out by the patient.
- The patient selects appropriate responses to all the questions.
- Detailed assessment in PDF format is emailed to the practitioner.
- The practitioner has an option to also print this report

For feedback or questions regarding general use and licensing of this application, please email painassessment.platform@gmail.com

title: Chronicle: Chronic Symptom and Pain Tracker
description:
Built with the chronic illness and chronic pain communities in mind, Chronicle is a simple and holistic symptom tracker that was built on three guiding principles.  First, that any symptom tracker needs to be fast, easy, and customizable to suit each user's individual needs and to promote daily use .  Secondly, that the information can be accessed and summarized in meaningful ways that let the user observe trends in symptom severity.  And lastly, that the information be exportable so it can be shared with healthcare professionals.

Chronicle allows you to record:
- Symptom occurrences, severity, and any descriptive information you want to record
- Medications taken
- Any daily events or occurrences that may affect symptoms

These records and their relationships can be visualized in a graphical summary over a 7-60 day period, allowing you to see how symptoms, medications, and events relate and affect chronic symptoms and illnesses, with the hope of facilitating more effective conversations with your healthcare provider.  Additionally, the raw data of your records can be exported to Google Drive in a CSV file format, which can then be shared with your Doctor, or imported into a spreadsheet document for further manipulation.


Social Media:
https://www.facebook.com/ChronicleTracker/
https://twitter.com/ChronicleTrackr

comments: I think this app could have been very useful but it seems the dev stopped short. The light blue font color against a white background is impossible to read without causing eye strain. All the screens have corrupted structure to them. Parts of a box will cover half the text and the scrolling doesn't work properly. Seems like a pre-beta version that just doesn't work.

I've been very sad with giving up my written bullet journal. This app allows me to track the same info, all in one, organized app. I just wish it were prettier and easier to read. Could you please add the capacity to zoom in, or have a larger print?
Very helpful and insightful tool, needs slight improvement. I wish that the graph would not plummet on the days that I do not log a symptom but would only factor in my submitted logs.
A good app allowing you to track all types of symptoms. Wish I could rename medicines. A tag system for common symptom descriptions would be extremely helpful.
This app does as intended. Not so pretty. But works. All my data is mine, there is no need to connect to a cloud service.

title: Knee Pain Exercise
description:
These knee pain relief exercises can help to get you moving normally, and safely, if you've a muscle or joint problem affecting your knee.

Knee pain is one of the most common orthopedic conditions for which people seek medical treatment. It includes pain felt behind and around the knee cap, especially during activities like stair climbing, squatting, running, and walking while carrying a heavy load. Knee pain can prevent you from participating in your favorite activities and performing daily tasks. Without proper treatment, it can be problematic for years.

Knee pain can be caused by a variety of factors, some of which include knee stiffness, incorrect positioning of the knee cap at rest or with movement, flat feet, improper exercise form, and weakness of the muscles that control the hip and knee.

Knee strengthening exercises do not affect the knee joint directly, but they strengthen the muscles surrounding it. Strong muscles in the legs can help provide support for the knees. This support may alleviate pressure and strain on these joints, which can relieve pain and help a person be more active.

Gentle stretching and strengthening exercises can strengthen the muscles that support your knee joint. Having stronger muscles can reduce the impact and stress on your knee, and help your knee joint move more easily.

Why exercise is vital?

Exercise can help you improve your health and fitness without hurting your joints. Exercise can:

‚úì Strengthen the muscles around your joints
‚úì Help you maintain bone strength
‚úì Give you more energy to get through the day
‚úì Make it easier to get a good night's sleep
‚úì Help you control your weight
‚úì Enhance your quality of life
‚úì Improve your balance

Application —Åontains:

‚úì Simple Exercises
‚úì Exercises For Knee Arthritis
‚úì Knee Strength And Recovery
‚úì Knee Saver Workout
‚úì General Information About Knee Pain


Note: Before you start an exercise program for knee pain, be sure to talk to your doctor or physical therapist to make sure the exercises are safe for you. Depending on your situation, they may recommend some modifications.

get your spinal disc healthy.





Sciatica is the term used to describe nerve pain in the buttocks, legs and feet. It is caused when the sciatic nerve ‚Äì the longest nerve in the body ‚Äì becomes compressed or irritated. If you‚Äôre suffering with pain that radiates down the back of your leg and into your feet, it could be sciatica.

The sciatic nerve starts at the lower spine before running through the buttock, down the back of the thigh and into the foot. It‚Äôs an important nerve that sends signals from the spinal cord to the entire lower body.

This app contains up to date information on sciatica, its home remedies and pain relief methods.

title: Menstrual Pain Remedies
description:
Menstruation or Period is a Normal Vaginal Bleeding that happens as part of a woman monthly cycle. Many women experience painful Periods every month. The pain is most often menstrual cramps which are a throbbing, cramping pain in the lower abdomen.  Other symptoms of menstrual cramps include lower back pain, nausea, diarrhea and headaches.

This app contains the different ways to treat menstrual pain by using both home remedies and pharmacological remedies.

You can also access all of the FREE video training we offer at lifeafterpain.com, via this app in audio or video format as well as other Medical and Lifestyle related content from Life After Pain Ltd at your convenience.

Using the Life After Pain app is completely free. Once you‚Äôre enrolled in a course at lifeafterpain.com/info/register, you get full access to your content by downloading the app.
